bibl.title: Preparatives to Hadrian's Visit to Egypt.
Studi in Onore di Aristide Calderini e Roberto Paribeni. II
bibl.author: van Groningen, B.A.

bibl.note: Memorandum sent by the scribe of the combined villages of Tholthis and Mouchinaryo in the Lower toparchy of the Oxyrhynchite nome to the strategus of that nome, 19th of December 129.
van Groningen B.A., Preparatives to Hadrian's Visit to Egypt.
Studi in Onore di Aristide Calderini e Roberto Paribeni. II (Milano, 1957) pp. 253-256.
